[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px”]The flowers come to you straight from the wholesaler, no sitting in the grocery store languishing away![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” border_color_all=”#ECB8CF” border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”#F5F5F5″][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#4A4850″ text_font_size=”40px” header_3_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_3_font_size=”35px” header_3_line_height=”0.1em” locked=”off”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px”]Enjoy the ease of having your flowers delivered right to your doorstep![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||3px||false|false” border_color_all=”#ECB8CF” border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”#F5F5F5″][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#4A4850″ text_font_size=”40px” header_3_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_3_font_size=”35px” header_3_line_height=”0.1em” locked=”off”]

Us
